snippet.textDisplay: I recently was hospitalized for 19 days with COVID pneumonia.  I came to the hospital day 10 of my infection.  They said I was too late for any "special" treatments.  I will add that I am unvaccinated and the doctor and nurses just expected me to die.  They told me this after I survived.  How did I survive?  They found that I was Vitamin D deficient.  Once they started me on the once a week 50000 Vitamin D pill, my lungs started to clear up and I started to feel so much better.  I tested COVID negative and was able to go home.  I completed avoided the ICU.  They want me to take the Vitamin D for the rest of my life because I have also shown to be deficient in the past.
